name: Last Signal
description:
Or you can download on Google Play Store:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SinkHole.LastSignal

Tabei's spaceship is under fuel leak.

Stay focused and control your broken spaceship.
Can you collect all the tesseracts avoiding space debris?

●Control Your Spaceship

Try not to hit the obstacles floating on the space! Keep your eyes on the fuel level. Once you spend all the fuel, the ship will explode!

●Collect Various Spaceships with Different Specs

With the coins you earned from your play, you can buy more spaceships! Each one of them has different specs, so you won't know which one is good or not before you actually select and play with it.

●Battery Boost Mode
-When your smartphone's battery level is lower than 20%, the battery boost mode will be activated and reward you with 20% more coins!

●Keyboard Control
-You can use the arrow keys and Z,X keys to control with your physical keyboard.(So yes. You can play this game with app players like Nox, Blustack, etc.)

If you're experiencing any problem with this game, please report on our facebook page:
http://facebook.com/sinkholestudio/
